attributes.action: Allow students to have drinks other than water in exams
attributes.background: Exams are a stressful time for students and during them, they should be made to feel as comfortable and relaxed as possible.  One way of doing this would be to allow students to have drinks such as fizzy drinks, tea and coffee in an exam situation.  I, for one, know this would calm my nerves.

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition, because the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for the issue you raise. The Joint Council for Qualifications, which is a membership organisation comprising the seven largest providers of qualifications in the UK, regulates what students can take into exams. You can contact the Joint Council for Qualifications here: http://www.jcq.org.uk/contact/.
